description: Metadata - Underlying customer id for tsfresh grouping
Risk - Bureau credit score (higher is better)
Risk - Balance to credit limit ratio
Operational - Promotional campaign flag (high PSI feature)
Derived - Unique months observed in trailing 12 month window
Derived - Missing months within trailing 12 month window
Derived - Coverage ratio over trailing 12 month window
Derived - Indicator of incomplete 12 month window
Derived - Application count in trailing 3 months
Derived - Months since customer first observed
Temporal - Month index relative to panel start
